sigVal.description: A numeric specifying the significance level of p-values

chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

fill.description: A character value, a vector, or a\link[plotgardener]{colorby} object specifying fill colors of data points

pch.description: A numeric value or numeric vector specifying point symbols

cex.description: A numeric indicating the amount by which points should bescaled relative to the default

leadSNP.description: A list specifying the lead SNP in the desired region andany associated aesthetic features of the lead SNP data point and text label

sigLine.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw a line at thesignificance level indicated with \code{sigVal}

sigCol.description: A character value specifying the color ofsignificant data points

trans.description: A character value specifying the transformation to apply to the"p" column plotted along the y-axis

range.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the y-rangeof p-values to plot (c(min, max))

yscale_reverse.description: A logical value indicating whether to reverse the y-scaleand order points from max to min

space.description: A numeric value indicating the space between eachchromosome as a fraction of the width of the plot, if plotting multiplechromosomes

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

baseline.description: A logical value indicating whether to include abaseline along the x-axis

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying Manhattan plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying Manhattan plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying Manhattan plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying Manhattan plot height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of Manhattan plot relative to its (x, y)location

flip.description: A logical value indicating whether to reflect Manhattan plotover the x-axis

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output shouldbe produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
